text: The Orangeburg Subdivision is a railroad line owned by CSX Transportation in the U.S. state of South Carolina. The line runs from Sumter, South Carolina, to Cope, South Carolina along the former Manchester and Augusta Railroad line, for a total of 53.8 miles. At its north end the line continues south from the Eastover Subdivision and at its south end the line continues south into the SCE&G; Power Plant Trackage.CSX Florence Division Timetable ==See also== * List of CSX Transportation lines * Manchester and Augusta Railroad * Cope Depot ==References== Category:CSX Transportation lines Category:Rail infrastructure in South Carolina
title: Orangeburg Subdivision
